content:
Never mind for now how or why I did this. I obtained my OpenCPN environment, which I list below formatted for easy reading.
It seems that the PATH has many duplications of OCPN paths likely set up at installation time.
Possibly, I have done something stupid at some time. Or might the installation be duplicating things?
The number of duplications is probably around the number of OCPN installs I have done.

COMMAND_MODE=unix2003
__CFBundleIdentifier=org.opencpn
PATH=
    /Users/Tony/Library/Application Support/OpenCPN/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Applications/OpenCPN.app/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Users/Tony/Library/Application Support/OpenCPN/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Applications/OpenCPN.app/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Users/Tony/Library/Application Support/OpenCPN/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Applications/OpenCPN.app/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Users/Tony/Library/Application Support/OpenCPN/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Applications/OpenCPN.app/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Users/Tony/Library/Application Support/OpenCPN/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Applications/OpenCPN.app/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Users/Tony/Library/Application Support/OpenCPN/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Applications/OpenCPN.app/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Users/Tony/Library/Application Support/OpenCPN/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Applications/OpenCPN.app/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Users/Tony/Library/Application Support/OpenCPN/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Applications/OpenCPN.app/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Users/Tony/Library/Application Support/OpenCPN/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Applications/OpenCPN.app/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Users/Tony/Library/Application Support/OpenCPN/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Applications/OpenCPN.app/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Users/Tony/Library/Application Support/OpenCPN/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Applications/OpenCPN.app/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Users/Tony/Library/Application Support/OpenCPN/Contents/PlugIns:
    /Applications/OpenCPN.app/Contents/PlugIns:
    /usr/bin:
    /bin:
    /usr/sbin:
    /sbin
LOGNAME=Tony
SSH_AUTH_SOCK=/private/tmp/com.apple.launchd.GQpSicsQNL/Listeners
HOME=/Users/Tony
MallocSpaceEfficient=1
SHELL=/bin/zsh
TMPDIR=/var/folders/9m/r5sw3ws14fs3x_jlhyxmdzm40000gp/T/
__CF_USER_TEXT_ENCODING=0x1F6:0:2
XPC_SERVICE_NAME=0
XPC_FLAGS=0x0
